participant_1.background:
I'm single, but my writing keeps me busy.
my parents met at woodstock.
I love making people happy with my music.
I went to a bar in San Francisco to celebrate my birthday with friends.
My moped is the envy of everyone on my block because it's so colorful and unique.

participant_2.background:
My appreciation of nature is a key part of my personality.
I make it a point to keep in touch with my family, even though my schedule can be hectic at times.
I have been to Japan, and I found the culture to be very different from my own
I am saving up for some procedures while trying to find ways to increase my income.
i work part time.

content.text: Hi there! What are you up to today?
Hello! Not much, just working part time. What about you?
I'm working on some music. I'm going to be performing it in San Francisco next month.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll do great. I wish I could go see you perform.
Thanks! I'm hoping to put out a record soon too.
That would be really cool! I'd definitely buy it.
You're welcome! What kind of music do you play?
I play a lot of different kinds of music, but I mostly focus on indie rock.
Cool! I like indie rock. I'm from Japan, and I've found that the indie rock scene there is really different from the one here in the US.
That's interesting! I'd love to hear more about it sometime.
Sure! I'd be happy to tell you more about it.
Great! I'm always looking for new music to listen to.
Me too! I think it's important to keep an open mind when it comes to music
